fields.name: Bill Gates
fields.description: Not a young but very ambitious developer
fields.ability: Will help you create a monopoly, knows how to terrorize competitors and pay off lawsuits

fields.name: Average Senior
fields.description: Nothing special, just an ordinary senior developer
fields.ability: He knows a lot, but pretends that he knows nothing just to do less

fields.name: Poor Junior
fields.description: Unemployed physics graduate willing to work for food
fields.ability: Can't do anything but tries very hard
